archimate:Node.name: Core Application and Database Server (CADSv)
archimate:Node.documentation:
Intended Use:
• Hosting critical systems: Hospital Information System (HIS), Electronic Health Records (EHR), Radiology Information System (RIS/PACS), Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS), ERP system.
Specifications:
• Processor Type: o Dual Intel Xeon Scalable Processors or AMD EPYC server-class processors (minimum 16 cores each CPU). • Memory Capacity: o 1TB DDR5 ECC (8-channel). • Storage Capacity and Configuration Options: o Minimum 24 TB total usable capacity o RAID 10 configuration (high performance and redundancy) with enterprise-grade SSD or NVMe drives o SAN/NAS connectivity for additional storage needs. • Network Connectivity: o Dual-port 10GbE (minimum) network adapters (redundancy, performance) o Fiber-channel or iSCSI connectivity for SAN storage. • Form Factor: o Rack-mounted server (2U–4U maximum), standard 19-inch rack compatibility. • Redundancy Features: o Redundant hot-swappable power supplies o Hot-swappable redundant fans o RAID storage redundancy o Network redundancy (dual-port adapters). • Power Supply Rating: o Dual redundant power supplies (750–1200W, 80 PLUS Gold or Platinum certified) o Supports high availability, minimizes downtime. • Cooling System: o Built-in redundant hot-swappable cooling fans o Optimized airflow design to prevent overheating in clinical data center environments. • Virtualization Support: o VMware ESXi, Microsoft Hyper-V, Citrix Hypervisor certified. • Operating System Compatibility: o Windows Server (2022 recommended) o Linux server distributions (e.g., Red Hat Enterprise Linux, Ubuntu Server). • Disaster Recovery: Multi-cloud sync (AWS/Azure/GCP) - 15-sec RTO for critical systems.
